author: David K. Li
title: Two felons escape Wisconsin prison, residents told 'lock your doors'
description: Two felons - Thomas Deering and James Newman - broke k out of a Wisconsin prison, Columbia Correctional Facility, and residents were told to 'lock your doors.'
content:
Two felons broke out of a maximum-security Wisconsin prison, and nearby residents were urged to "lock your doors," authorities said Thursday,
James Newman, 37, and Thomas Deering, 46, are inmates at the Columbia Correctional Facility in Portage, about 40 mil… [+767 chars]
